jobs.title: UX Designer
description: Develop, test, and maintain responsive, high-performance web applications using modern front-end technologies.
Collaborate with UI/UX designers to translate wireframes and prototypes into functional code.
Integrate front-end components with APIs and backend services.
Ensure cross-browser compatibility and optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Participate in code reviews and contribute to continuous improvement.

jobs.title: Frontend Developer
description: Build reusable UI components with React and TypeScript.
Work closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect UIs.
Optimize bundle size and runtime performance.
Write unit and integration tests for front-end modules.

jobs.title: Product Designer
description: Lead product design for core features and user flows.
Conduct user research and usability testing.
Create high-fidelity prototypes and design systems.

jobs.title: UI Engineer
description: Implement accessible and responsive UI components.
Collaborate with backend engineers to consume APIs.
Maintain component library and documentation.

jobs.title: Interaction Designer
description: Design interaction patterns and micro-interactions.
Work on motion design and prototyping.
Ensure consistency across product experiences.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
description: Design and build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.
Implement database schemas and optimize queries.
Ensure security, scalability, and maintainability of services.
Collaborate with front-end team to define API contracts.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
description: Maintain CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure as code.
Monitor system performance and implement alerting.
Automate deployment, scaling, and recovery processes.
Work with teams to improve reliability and security.

jobs.title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze large datasets to extract actionable insights.
Build predictive models and evaluate performance.
Communicate findings to stakeholders with visualizations.
Collaborate with engineering to productionize models.

jobs.title: Mobile Developer
description: Develop native and cross-platform mobile apps (React Native/Flutter).
Ensure app performance and responsiveness on multiple devices.
Integrate mobile apps with backend APIs.
Participate in app store submission and maintenance.

jobs.title: QA Engineer
description: Write and run automated test suites (E2E, integration).
Perform manual exploratory testing and report issues.
Collaborate with developers to reproduce and fix bugs.
Improve QA processes and testing coverage.
